description: The file is the main entry point of a Flutter application for a kindergarten management system. It initializes environment variables, sets up the app widget tree with providers and themes, and launches the app.

classes.name: KindergartenApp
classes.description: A stateless widget that sets up the app's theme, state management, and navigation structure, and serves as the root of the widget tree.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The application's main entry point that initializes environment variables and launches the KindergartenApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, including setting up providers and the MaterialApp with themes and initial navigation.
